bill.title: Taxation District; Boards of Review
bill.description: Allows for up to 3 boards of review per taxation district and allows members of one board to be temporarily assigned to another board within the same district for purposes of establishing and maintaining quorum. Eliminates the April 9 deadline for each board to commence public meetings; requires meetings at least once annually. (HD1)
